markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Symphony of the Unfettered Heart](/Feats.aspx?ID=1651) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 114 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You learn the [_symphony of the unfettered heart_](/Spells.aspx?ID=733) composition spell, which enables you to protect an ally against incapacitating conditions.
name: Symphony of the Unfettered Heart
